original_title: La Bestia - Train of the Unknowns
overview: "Casa del Migrante" in Huehuetoca, a suburb at the gates of Mexico City, is a safe haven for migrants. At least for two days. Then they must go on with their journey towards north in freight train carriages, which everyone here just calls "La Bestia," the beast.
title: La Bestia - Train of the Unknowns
